member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_SEEK_ORIGIN
member.summary: Specifies the origin for a seek request.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_SEEK_ORIGIN.msoBegin
member.summary: The seek position is specified relative to the start of the stream.

member.name: MFBYTESTREAM_SEEK_ORIGIN.msoCurrent
member.summary: The seek position is specified relative to the current read/write position in the stream.
